summary: English speaking app with teacher functionality
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly teacher illustration with welcoming expression for homepage hero section (teacher-hero.dim_800x600.png)
- Simple microphone icon for speaking practice button (microphone-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Book and speech bubble illustration for learning sections (learning-illustration.dim_400x300.png)

existing_features.title: Create a user interface for English speaking practice sessions where learners can view conversation prompts and practice speaking exercises
Implement teacher/instructor functionality that allows viewing and managing student speaking practice sessions
Create a library of English speaking exercise prompts covering different proficiency levels and topics
Design a creative, engaging visual theme with warm, educational aesthetics that encourages language learning, using colors and typography that feel welcoming and motivating for learners of all ages

new_feature_requests.summary: Store speaking practice session data including exercise prompts, completion status, and timestamps in the backend
